name: Salicylic Acid Acne Day Dots
about: What it is: Our thinnest, sheer acne patch for virtually invisible wear, alone or under makeup, with acne-fighting actives to minimize the look of breakouts...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Redness and Acne and Blemishes..Formulation: Mask..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Encapsulated Salicylic Acid: Penetrates pores to target acne blemishes and blackheads..- Retinol (Retinyl Acetate/Vitamin A): Promotes clear-looking skin..- Aloe Vera Leaf Extract: Gently soothes while minimizing the appearance of redness...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: 61% thinner than our original acne patch, our made-for-makeup, petroleum-free, medical-grade hydrocolloid contains anti-acne ingredient encapsulated salicylic acid to boost efficacy and reduce the risk of irritation. Visibly reduce breakouts in 6 hours or less...Clinical Results: In a consumer study with 20 participants:.- 91% said their blemish was less red, less uncomfortable, and significantly less annoying 6 hours after use.- 91% said their blemish appeared healed where the dot was applied.- 95% said the product helped soothe the skin where applied.- -100% of the participants said this product helped protect and heal skin while wearing makeup.*Claims based on a 4-12 hour study conducted on twenty (20) participants..
ingredients: -Encapsulated Salicylic Acid: Penetrates pores to target acne blemishes and blackheads..-Retinol (Retinyl Acetate/Vitamin A): Promotes clear-looking skin..-Aloe Vera Leaf Extract: Gently soothes while minimizing the appearance of redness...Salicylic Acid 0.5%, Cellulose Gum, Glyceryl Hydrogenated Rosinate, Styrene/Isoprene Copolymer, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Retinyl Acetate......The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-After cleansing, apply a dot, tacky side down, directly on your blemish..-Follow with skincare and/or makeup, such as an oil- or water-based foundation..-For best results, wear for at least six hours..-For peskier pimples, use with Salicylic Acid Acne Healing Dots (sold separately) at night. .-If you're experiencing any areas of excessive dryness or open skin, or if you went a little heavy handed with peels, chemical exfoliation, or actives, give your skin a little resting time before using Peace Out dots or patches.

reviews.review_text: Full disclosure: I don't have acne-prone skin, I use Peace Out dots to treat occasional pimples. The individual patches are thinner and therefore a bit more translucent, so they're a bit less noticeable under makeup/on a bare face. In my opinion, they work just as well as the regular dots. I find putting them onto freshly cleansed skin helps it to do its job better, and I find leaving it on for the days allows it to work better. My skin is dry/combination and I had no irritation, and no further dryness. I have a darker complexion and I find it's only when people get close to my face, that they would notice it's there. I hope this helped!

It had the white spot after a few hours from drawing the gunk out. It didn’t irritate my skin at all. I just wish they were priced a little lower. I have others that work similarly but a little less discreet so I’ll save these if I need to wear one while running errands.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Okay so my only beef with them is that the dots were so large. I also felt that they didn’t work as well as some competitors. It didn’t have the same satisfaction of pulling it off and seeing it actually worked. I felt that since the patch was so large it actually irritated my skin a little when I pulled it off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I liked these, I was excited to see that they’re really invisible, and they work very quickly to dissolve my acne. I will tell my friends about this and I will be purchasing some for myself :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am lucky that I don’t break out much but I do get a pimple from time to time. I did happen to get a couple of them. The first was an underground, you know the ones that just makes your face swell, is hot to the touch but will not pop. I applied one of the patches overnight and I did notice the inflammation settle down quite a bit. The second was a normal side one. It did develop and the patch helped it come to a head quickly. Overall thinner than others as well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have never used a product like this before, but I think it worked pretty well with nighttime wear. I would not recommend wearing with makeup on top, I don’t think it would be easy to hide as advertised.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These dots are great. I was really surprised by how well they worked. I used them on a break out that had just popped up and within 2 days it was gone. Very happy! I received this product complimentary from influenster in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love these. I received them free from Influenster in a vox box! So with said I never would have bought these! But since Influenster gave me the opportunity to use it and review it. I used them and now I love them! They do shrink pimples faster than they would go away naturally, does work on bigger pimples but does take longer obviously to make disappear! Definitely recommend!!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I did receive this product for a honest review.   For the most they do work. I did see it sucking out the pimple. The little zip lock bag was nice to keep the patches in. I notice mine started to separate, the outside foil to the bag.   The main issue I had with it is that I had a hard time peeling off the dot. I notice that sometimes my nail would pitch it, where it kinda suck to itself. And it was super hard to flat it out afterwards.   If it had an easier pull and apply technique I would totally recommend. For now I will stick with Mighty Patch. The dots have a split plastic where it's easier to pull off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I happened to wake up with a huge pimple the day after I got these. I put one on for 6 hours. They are very lightweight and blend in nicely. I forgot I was wearing it all day. I did notice the pimple healed a little quicker than it normally would, but it wasn't instant. I will say it was probably the biggest pimple I've had. I think it would probably work better on smaller pimples, but haven't had to chance to try it yet. I would buy them again and I would recommend them if you're trying to get rid of pimples quicker than normal.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to see where the brand was manufactured, but didn’t list a country on the packaging (that’s weird not to list it). My guess is South Korea since they invented this. Why not buy there OG brands like Skin Food? They are also way cheaper. I also recommend The Crème Shop. Save your money and don’t pay more for this.

reviews.review_title: Must have if you have money to splurge
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These work great! They get the job done and overall really pleased with the results. HOWEVER I am taking 2 stars away because it's way too expensive for what it is and what it does. There are so many other brands with 40, 50, or more FOR THE SAME PRICE. I think the aesthetic pov is great and it's targeted towards teens or young adults with acne issues

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

I still had a little bit of a bump but very much unnoticeable. I'll definitely keep these around for what I need them and would for sure recommend them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin

I wholeheartedly recommend giving Peace Out Skincare Acne Day Dot a try if you're seeking a discreet and effective solution for covering up pimples and their blemishes. I was shocked that this tiny little blemish sticker was capable of helping heal blemishes in such a short amount of time! I also have a teenage daughter that struggles with blemishes often, and this is the perfect product for her. Since she began using these Acne Day Dots by Peaceout Skincare over a week ago, I’ve noticed some very positive changes in her confidence and self-esteem. That alone is enough to keep me coming back for more. I’m so grateful that this company released such an effective and innovative product that actually works! Thanks so much! @peaceoutskincare #spotthedot #acnedaydots #influenster #FreshFavesVoxBox

Also, since the sheet the patches are on doesn’t rip in the middle to get a patch off you have to peel the patch off the plastic which causes the patch to get kind of bunched in the place you rip it off and makes it even more noticeable when it’s on your face.
